front.title: Gap Analysis on Network Virtualization Activities

abstract.t: The main goal of this document is to serve as a survey of the different efforts that have been taken and are currently taking place at IETF and IRTF in regards to network virtualization, automation and orchestration, putting them into context considering efforts by other SDOs, and identifying current gaps and challenges that can be tackled at IETF or researched at the IRTF.
